      Using rerddap to Access Data from ERDDAP Servers
    • Changelog

    Function reference

    rerddap Package Description

    rerddap rerddap-package
    rerddap

    Search

    Functions to search for ERDDAP servers as well as to search ERDDAP for datasets whose metadata match the given search.

    ed_search() ed_datasets()
    Search for ERDDAP tabledep or griddap datasets
    ed_search_adv()
    Advanced search for ERDDAP tabledep or griddap datasets
    global_search()
    global_search
    servers()
    ERDDAP server URLS and other info

    Obtain basic dataset metadata

    Obtain the basic dataset metadata to help in subsetting and downloading.

    info() as.info()
    Get information on an ERDDAP dataset.
    browse()
    Browse a dataset webpage.

    Subset and Download Data

    Functions to subset and download ERDDAP grids and tables.

    griddap()
    Get ERDDAP gridded data
    tabledap()
    Get ERDDAP tabledap data.

    Optional Settings for Data Download

    Optional settings for functions that subset and download ERDDAP grids and tables.

    disk() memory()
    Options for saving ERDDAP datasets.
    eurl()
    Default ERDDAP server URL

    Cache Handling

    Functions for dealing with ‘rerddap’ cache.

    cache_delete() cache_delete_all()
    Delete cached files
    cache_details()
    Get details of cached files
    cache_setup() cache_info()
    Setup cache path
    cache_list()
    List cached files

    Various ERDDAP Based Utilities

    Various ERDDAP based utilities for converting parameters.

    convert_time()
    Convert a UDUNITS compatible time to ISO time
    convert_units()
    Convert a CF Standard Name to/from a GCMD Science Keyword
    fipscounty()
    Convert a FIPS County Code to/from a County Name
    key_words()
    Convert a CF Standard Name to/from a GCMD Science Keyword
    version()
    Get ERDDAP version

    Datasets

    Datasets used in the the functions nd vignette.

    colors
    cmocean colors The cmocean color palette by Kristen Thyng as implemented in the R package "oce"
    institutions
    institutions
    ioos_categories
    ioos_categories
    keywords
    keywords
    longnames
    longnames
    standardnames
    standardnames
    variablenames
    variablenames
